title: "Fire proof door" means a door or shutter fitted to a wall opening, made of fire resistant material to prevent the transmission and spread of heat and fire for a specified period
clause_text: "Fire proof door" means a door or shutter fitted to a wall opening, made of fire resistant material to prevent the transmission and spread of heat and fire for a specified period.
